en.Title: Short instructions on how to start earning on
en.1Point: Go to the official website of the
en.1Point_2: and fill out the registration form.
en.2Point: Wait for a call from a manager who will help you set up your account over the phone.
en.3Point: Top up your balance with any amount from
en.4Point: Withdrawal of money can be made at any time. It is credited to the account within 2-3 hours (depending on the bank).

es.2Point: Espera una llamada de un gerente que te ayudará a configurar tu cuenta por teléfono.
